meta.description: Minimize the cost of relocating freight cars among 5 regions to meet the demand for the fall harvest.

sets.name: REGIONS
sets.description: Regions in the country where freight cars need to be relocated.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of moving a car from one region to another.

params.name: current_cars
params.description: Current number of cars available in each region.

params.name: needed_cars
params.description: Number of cars needed in each region for the harvest.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of cars to move from one region to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in REGIONS for j in REGIONS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of moving cars between regions.

constraints.name: supply_constraint_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][j] for j in REGIONS) - sum(x[i]['1'] for i in REGIONS)

constraints.name: supply_constraint_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['2'][j] for j in REGIONS) - sum(x[i]['2'] for i in REGIONS)

constraints.name: supply_constraint_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['3'][j] for j in REGIONS) - sum(x[i]['3'] for i in REGIONS)

constraints.name: supply_constraint_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['4'][j] for j in REGIONS) - sum(x[i]['4'] for i in REGIONS)

constraints.name: supply_constraint_5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['5'][j] for j in REGIONS) - sum(x[i]['5'] for i in REGIONS)
